channel.title: Ulone
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Session 12
item.description:
We are on our back way to the Hideaway...
Paragus sends a message
CeolðŸ”¥ hears a soft crunching of bones, looking up at ~20 Shokari Your need help? Ride. Trade. Meat. Small. From bodies. For the hunt.
Upon eating WahlenðŸ’«... "Old. Older than Shokari." We get on their horses with ape hands and horns and ride
PraxisðŸ˜¼ gets a note from Paragus: "I have found something I can't explain. Please come help." PraxisðŸ˜¼ makes his way there....
WahlenðŸ’« is in a makeshift dungeon dreaming... In the shower, water cold. Speaker translates as words come through announcing my arrival. "Fire fox, fire fox"... meaning you are needed in the cockpit
In the cockpit there is crystals with projections of status. Terrada is on the helm, high alert with fox-like features; Oharah is holding their blade tapping their foot. Projection in front of Terrada, 6 crystals with names of the Akions. Tengu and Ryu are down. Blob of flesh, metal, and stone... 2 crystals on it: Yamakain, Yokami
Tsuchigomo has been eliminated, Yuki-onna has been eliminated... cooling systems offline... all Akions go offline... Okami online We get to the escape pods, jet out, ship destroyed, among the stars
Dream cuts to current (2) Campaign/4-Locations/Ulone/Ulone, hard to breathe, massive blade in kidney, poison going through body, Akenai is trying to heal WahlenðŸ’«. Oharah runs towards WahlenðŸ’«, stabbing a shard into his heart... Oharah does an operation, dropping part of WahlenðŸ’«'s heart on the ground. Oharah grabs the half of heart and the memory ends
WahlenðŸ’« and HeraðŸ‘¿ switch dreams...
WahlenðŸ’« is no longer in their body... in HeraðŸ‘¿'s body, she's training with her father. This is a nice memory of HeraðŸ‘¿'s training... Memory cuts to her and Serai studying with a book open on the desk, mouth agape... This is a big betrayal. Serai says nothing to deny it. HeraðŸ‘¿ grabs her blade and runs out of the estate.
As HeraðŸ‘¿ dreams weird dreams before her dreams are interrupted, her mind reeling. She is in the Suteki. Terrada is in front her her, long 9 tails, 2 large fox ears, looking aside and seeing a split rift of reality. (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone is standing next to him, a root of Levin in his hand. Everyone is frozen in place, terrified. Terrada is looking (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone down. "Run. Both of you. Run. Run as fast as you can." (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone lunges at WahlenðŸ’« before Terrada intercepts. A MASSIVE battle erupts. It sounds like Terrada is losing.
HeraðŸ‘¿ wakes up screaming before she stops.. She's not breathing. She's dying.
At the Hideaway...
CeolðŸ”¥ repairs armor and weapons, removing the sigil of Samni on Mako's armor
Ruiâ›„ gets pulled aside by Yari
You do know you're traveling with... motions to HeraðŸ‘¿"

item.title: Ulone Lore
Unused Items
item.description:
A handful of Yellow Talismans and Green Talismans Items
4 x Ice Sticks
4 x Fire Sticks Gourd of sobriety Ruby of the War Mage

item.title: Session 8 Loot
item.description: 15 gp 50 gp in 5 gold bars 20 silver bars, 5gp each

item.title: Tekina
Ulone
Taor
item.description: While not necessarily a region itself, it is found in almost every region. The Taor are ancient ruins said to have existed before the war. No one knows who their inhabitants were, but some theorize they were much more advanced given that the stone that make these ruins have never been broken. Be that from human attempts and natural phenomena. Taor ruins are restricted to everyone other than the leaders of the region. Anyone else found trespassing will be given punishment.

item.title: Yatari
item.description:
Yatari is known as the region whose worship can be felt from miles away. They are undying to their gods and will use their religious fervor to harness magic. This is where most if not all shrine maidens come from. Some may call them fanatics to the missing Yatari or the gods themselves, but to claim they are ineffective in their ways is unfounded as you can see a shrine maiden in almost every town even outside Yatari. One person in charge, the Tekina of Darkness
Hikari Seiji attacked Yatari

item.title: Whistling Mountains
item.description: The largest mountain range in Ulone. It separates the land of leaves from the rest of the region. Itâ€™s mostly uninhabited other than non Heili dragons (Your standard European dragon), rumors of what should be long extinct Oni, and cult of the Helix dragons at the base.

item.title: Samni
item.description: Samni is located in the middle of the continent. Trade is the main factor of the economy here and is often considered the richest region. Itâ€™s not uncommon to see common folk with silk clothing and having the pocket change to hire Sea Ronin. They hold almost every festival, big or small.

item.title: Land of Leaves
item.description: Named after the leaves that fall on the ground from the great Levin. Levin resides in the middle of this region and can even be seen over the whistling mountains. This is where the Samurai train fledglings and grant them their rights as rulers. Only the highest of nobility, and those who would become samurai are allowed to traverse on this golden land.

item.title: Ikcho
item.description: Ikcho is often hailed as the land of creativity and is easily a hundred years ahead of every other region due to the creations they keep for themselves. They are responsible for almost every non rudimentary item or structure you see.

item.title: Lostwing
item.description: A town that surrounds a Taor ruin of a wing

item.title: Forgotten Lands
Suteki
item.description: Basically the complete opposite to the material plane. The immaterium. This is where people are believed to go when dying if they are not within the good graces of Levin. Itâ€™s Celestia, itâ€™s Hell, itâ€™s the Abyss, itâ€™s the astral plane. Basically every plane in your standard D&D game other than the material plane. People donâ€™t know shit about it other than when you Misty step, you go there, and that itâ€™s bad.

item.title: Yari Talvec
item.description:
A Yuan-Ti man that hardly looks old enough to drink. Bits of golden scales around his neck, cheeks, and forearms match his striking golden blonde hair. Heâ€™s built rather stocky compared to the average person of his race but is also significantly shorter standing at five foot four. He is always seen with his chokuo at his hip, sheathed in a saya of golden emblems from the House Talvec. 
After the death of his grandfather, he was thrust into the position of leadership of Saohun and the clan despite only being a fledgling. He is now possibly marked a traitor for his organization of the Imugi Arcaneworks infiltration.

item.title: Gyota
item.description:
Lady Ayame Liotus' cousin hired him... Then her cousin died, now he's a grief counselor
Monkey called Mr. Banana
Met in Session 8

item.title: Ghomah
item.description: Saytr, human face squished in

item.title: Enokaga Aritomi
item.description:
Bearer from Saohun, owns a gator
Fair, lady-like, graceful, and charming are words used to directly contrast what Enokaga is. She is a massive bovine abhuman bearer standing at six foot five without her horns with a muscular build of an overworked farmer and warrior. Her greasy and messy blonde hair with splotches of black matches the brown ragged clothing typical for a bearer. Her native magic seems to be that of stone. Currently serves as a scout for Paragus Kou.Side note: Literally everyone forgets her name until I say â€˜Gator ladyâ€™.

item.title: Paragus Kou
item.description:
A human in his late 40â€™s with short black hair and a slender build. Scars layer his fingers that are mostly covered in bronze rings. His eyes have a seemingly yellow and slit like look to them that contrasts against his dark layered robes. He was revealed to be the vessel for the Dragon of Spring and current outlaw in most regions due to his freeing of bearers to conduct research for his son. 
He was previously the Lord Taisho of Yatari (essentially high commander) before he betrayed the emperor, Arasuda Tenbatsu, and his previous wife, Kazera: Tekina of the Wind

item.title: Barolt Kou
item.description: A young man wearing a furred wolf head that seems to be stitched at the neck. A large brand is upon his chest thatâ€™s easily seen as he is shirtless and the rest of his body is sported with ragged black clothing. He is nothing short of feral, wearing a collar that seemingly controls the fits of ferocity.

item.title: Atidari
item.description: Ruler of Samni and Mako's and Akaza's father

item.title: Kazera
item.description: Met at the fortress for peace talks. Is buddy buddy with Kazera.

item.title: Ganra Dokugan
item.description: Tekina of Tsuchigomo

item.title: Arasuda Tenbatsu
item.description: Tekina of Amanozako

item.title: Lord Delivon
item.description: Head of House Delivon

item.title: Ikcho, the Daughter Who Could Craft the World Itself
item.guid: (2) Campaign/3-People/2-Historic/Ikcho, the Daughter Who Could Craft the World Itself.md

item.title: Mako
item.description:
Shioriâ­'s brother
Is a Sea Ronin Silver white hairThe white haired son of the Shuki family. His long white hair often is seen going down to his middle back covering most of the back of his light blue haori. His tanned skin and blue eyes match with his clothing but contrast against his hair. He often carries two odachi sized cleaver sabers that are connected by a long chain. Before their disbandment, he was the Sea Roninâ€™s third in command but had only ever led one mission.  He was his brother's shield, promising to protect the blessing he had and his family forevermore. As the second Aikon of Fire appeared, he was consumed by its flame leaving his fate unknown, as a body was never found at Ninnan gate.

item.title: Akaza
item.description: Max 19 years oldThe spitting image of a nobleâ€™s son. He is frail looking, slightly pale, and is dressed in fine silks. His blonde hair runs down to his cheeks and his green eyes are those of unburdened ones. He is the Tekina of Ryu, warden of fire, but met his end from a second Aikon of fire at Ninnan gate.

item.title: Bam Bam
item.description: The Creature

item.title: Serai
item.description: HeraðŸ‘¿'s sister?Wields her father's blade

item.title: Himoto
item.description: HeraðŸ‘¿'s dad

item.title: Shokari
item.description: Green skinned lizard / avian / human creatures Eating a small amount of meat from people makes them stronger? Rides horses with monkey hands and long horns

item.title: Umi Kiba
item.description: Also commonly known as â€˜Maelstromâ€™. After the events of Ninnan Gate, they rose from the seas attacking those on the coast without mercy. This faction is entirely made up of Triton but other Triton claim the Umi Kiba do not represent them and are a deviant group. Their tactics have found success along the coast and seek to find more as they unveiled their own Tekina, specifically the one of Yuki-Onna. This would mark the first time in nearly fifty years that Yuki-Onna has appeared.

item.title: No-Kurai
item.description: Also known as the blades of Amanozako, or â€˜flawless bladesâ€™. After driving out the Hikari Seiji, Yatari was put under their rule with the leader being Arasuda Tenbatsu, Tekina of Amanozako. Under his rule, Yatari was turned into a Yokoku where one lord presides. Yatari now often practices experiments with the Suteki, which was once outlawed by the Samurai. After driving out the Hikari Seiji, they have been content since.

item.title: Kagenami
item.description: The Kagenami first showed themselves on the night of Samniâ€™s extinguishing and bore the same steel and appearance of Samurai but have since claimed they are not in direct association with the land of reeds, only that they are a splinter group. The Samurai have not made any attempts to stop or impede them in any way however. As of now, the Kagenami have a standing agreement with the Imugi arcane works, a main part of Samni led by Ganra Dokugan, Tekina of Tsuchigomo, warden of Earth.

item.title: Hikari Seiji
item.description: The now rulers of Samni with their forces known as â€˜Shinsei-Banâ€™ or â€˜Dawnbladesâ€™ more casually. Their forces are led by Shino Korin Hikari, Tekina of Komyoryu, warden of light. After their retreat to the land of Samni, they quickly established their rule with none to oppose them and established a new holy order once again worshipping Levin and the other gods. They have attempted many more plays for power since they certainly have the force to do so. But as of right now they have been unsuccessful other than their conquering of Samni.

item.title: Zahl
item.description: Female counterpart: Death Male counterpart: Life

item.title: Wiboe
item.description: Female counterpart: War Male counterpart: Peace

item.title: Mondli
item.description: Female counterpart: Sun Male counterpart: Moon

item.title: Kam-Zum
item.description: Female counterpart: Earth Male counterpart: Wind

item.title: Yuki-onna
item.description: The Warden of IceGone for a long time, over 70 years... Was a semi-cat-like person that had a lot of flowing robes that ended in ice

item.title: Tsuchigomo
item.description: The EarthshakerLargest of the Akion, made of a lot of stone... Does not have a lot of magical power, just punches... Currently the ruler of Ikcho

item.title: Tengu
item.description: Breath of WindLarge bird like creature

item.title: Ryu
item.description: The Flying Flame

item.title: Orochi
item.description: The Lord of LightningWields a large staff

item.title: Namazu
item.description: The Lost, Warden of WaterLong serpentine feature, has more of a beak than a mouth... Travels through the sea

item.title: Komyoryu
item.description: The BlindingLooks like the dragons found in the Whistling Mountains, does not have front legs but has back-legs and wings... Does not like Amanozako. Shoots beams of light from wings.

item.title: Amanozako
item.description: The Ever-SettingFully armored man riding a horse, always a good swordsman, blade can cut through anything... Only other Akion to kill another.

item.title: (6) A Chance Encounter
item.description: As the party has joined house Liotus heading Northward, winter draws ever closer. They are still a minimum of a three month travel from the border without weather delays. As winter came full force to the traveling caravan, they were significantly slowed down. As time went on, more and more people started going missing from the caravan until the remnants of the group were encountered by a small group of yokai. The party vanquished them leaving them as the only survivors of the caravan. On the yokai were simple instructions. â€˜Bring me Wahlen and Ceol, signed, your lordâ€™. They then went to the Aclassi estate where Serai asked Hera to attend a meeting in Ironblossom keep to see why her father was invited. Now they travel, hopefully to avoid the oncoming skirmish which could possibly start the first declaration of war after Uloneâ€™s death.

item.title: (5) Superstitions Put to Steel
item.description: The four were able to pull themselves out of the rushing river, where they finally were able to take a breath. Enokaga revealed to them that they had been captured for nearly half a year, given they were in the North Eastern part of Ikcho. Not wanting to stay any longer than they had to, the party made their way to a roadside inn after a long day of traveling. The inn keeper was hesitant to let them in given it was the night of Veylfall, a night every quarter of the year where it is believed the more monstrous parts of the world become braver and more viscous. They eventually convinced him and they were let in and got some rest. The innkeeper mentioned his son hadnâ€™t come back and the party offered to find him. Overjoyed, the innkeeper gave WahlenðŸ’« a good luck charm of Levin and said his son wore its twin. They then set off to find his son at a sacrificial area known as Bloodshore Rock. With HeraðŸ‘¿â€™s arrival coming just before they left, the group set off to Bloodshore Rock and found nearly fifty feral Abhumans along with a man dressed in red silk robes and a fox max with a tied and gagged man in tow. As he chanted, the party intervened, cutting through the mass amount of bodies until Ruiâ›„ was able to kill the man revealing it was the innkeeper's son. WahlenðŸ’« then grabbed the man's blade causing a vision and a surge of power in the party. Right after this happened, the Taor ruins lit up with a guardian moving towards them to which they fled, going back to the inn. Along the way, they met a noble house at arms, House Liotus, finishing off the Abhumans that escaped the partyâ€™s wrath. They got a ride from them to the inn where they discovered the innkeeper holed up in his room with dozens upon dozens of tiny holes each containing a small worm that made up the food they had eaten. The innkeeper said that his name did not matter and that he was now something called Legion. Legion claimed that the time of the Yokai has been forgotten, and they will have their due. CeolðŸ”¥ then killed him in a burning blaze and ensuring that every worm inside them was killed.

item.title: (4) A Guttering Light
item.description: The last thing that was seen was the party being pulled out of rubble. The only thing left living at Ninnan Gate seemingly. Fading in and out of deep slumber and being fed berries that nourished them while also keeping them in said deep slumber, the party found themselves in shackles on a cart. In the brief moments they awoke, they realized they each were in a cell, still shackled, and being questioned. Over many loops of falling into a slumber, awaking in a haze, and being questioned, the loop had finally ended. A small group consisting of Yari Talvec, Paragus and Barolt Kou, Enokaga Aritomi, and one other eluded to broke Ceol, Rui, and Wahlen out. After mentioning that Hera was also there, Paragus and Barolt went to find her ordering the others to leave. As they did so, they discovered they were in a mass industrial factory in Ikcho known as Imugi arcane works (I said Leviathan works but I forgot the name off the top of my head and I didnâ€™t put it in my session notes. Ya boy he dumb)As they continued on, alarm bells began to ring throughout the area and a Samurai tried to stop them. Yari told them to leave and the last the party saw of Yari was him against the samurai in a very one sided battle not in his favor. The party finally reached their escape route which was an unfinished mining tunnel. They began to drive a large cart down the tunnel, the four fending off pursuers and eventually a large construct. Unable to stop the cart, it ran off an incomplete rail way, tumbling into rapids below.

item.title: (3) I Bid That Flames Return
item.description: As the party was hired by the Shuki family, it was revealed that Akaza is the Tekina of fire and has not yet been able to transform into Ryu. But as the threat of a sub section of Yatari moving towards Samni, Ryu is needed if Samni is to face the might of an opposing Aikon. The night before Akaza was to enter a Taor ruin to hopefully complete his transformation. Ninnan gate was attacked by a group that bore colors from the land of leaves. The party managed to repel the small attacking force including a Gakus tank Samurai, which they were able to find some had infiltrated their ranks. Shiori tried to warn Akibari and Akaza too late. Akibara was slain and Akaza embodied the form of Ryu, disintegrating Shiori in the process. While this happened, the party got a splitting headache causing them to fall to the ground where they were able to see a man in front of them catch on fire and burn into the form of a second Aikon of fire leading to the death of Ryu. That night, Ninnan gate and Samni fell.
item.guid: (2) Campaign/0-Quests/(3) I Bid That Flames Return.md

item.title: (2) Under New Management
item.description: Macko had been given his first command by his father, Akibara Shuki. He is to lead Shiori, Ceol, Rui, and Wahlen to Kaminan to clear out rumored invading monsters and then meet at Ninnan gate, a stronghold in Samni. As they arrived at Kaminan, the party was met with over a dozen small creatures known as Krasue. Upon dispatching them, the leader seemed to summon a much larger one known as a â€˜Dokkabeiâ€™ which they once again killed with ease. After pursuing the fleeing leader into a bog where a Jabbaku swallowed the leader whole. As the fight with the massive brambly beast ensued, everyone was on their last legs where Rui delivered the final blow to the massive beast. Now they set out for Ninnan gate.

item.title: (1) A Shrine Maiden is Neither Late Nor Early
item.description: The heir of clan Talvec, Yari Talvec, has worries about the local shrine maiden not appearing. The party has been hired to go investigate her whereabouts. After arriving at the shrine, the party was stopped by 3 men claiming they were members of a different shrine maiden. After a fight, the party investigated the shrine, finding a small creature and a crazed shrine maiden. The creature fled, slamming two talismans together, one yellow and one green. The party did the same with some they had found transporting them to a different realm where they spoke with Terrada, king of the Yokai. The king claimed that the festival incident and what happened to the shrine maiden was due to another lord of the Yokai, Ohara Sachio, launching attacks. They returned to the shrine with the small yokai creature that was in service of the king named â€˜Goomaâ€™ where the shrine maiden was healed. The king offered to have the party join his retinue to stop Ohara but they instead settled on working adjacent to each other and helping where they could.
item.guid: (2) Campaign/0-Quests/(1) A Shrine Maiden is Neither Late Nor Early.md

item.title: (0) Onwards to Spring
item.description: At last. A celebration of spring is no longer held in the capital of Samni. Saohun has been permitted to hold a small festival in the town and all around the area have been given the opportunity to attend. For whatever reason, you have come here as well. Be it to buy from traders, sell to the mass foot traffic, or just experience the majesty of Springâ€™s rise. As the sun set and Lord Talvec began to introduce himself, he quickly took his own life spawning what are theorized to be Yokai which the party managed to quickly dispatch.

item.title: Wahlen
item.description:
Player: Andrew (he/they)Infobox
WahlenðŸ’« made their way into town where Akenai Sachio greeted him and berated him for being late. After the events of the festival, Akenai disappeared and no one around town seemed to know of an Akenai. The only known information is that a Yokai lord shares her name and that she did not pass through Samni. 
After picking up a blade that was used for a ritual, WahlenðŸ’« recovered a memory. Akenai stood next to a man who was seemingly appealing to Terrada about a small shard of prismatic glass he held. After a small discussion they were denied. Terrada then addressed WahlenðŸ’« saying that his trust was broken and the topic was supposed to stay between them.
During the slaughter of Ninnan Gate, WahlenðŸ’« saw a hooded figure for just a moment. Perhaps it was the trick of the light, but no one else seemed to notice him.

item.title: Rui
item.description: Player: Marlo (she/her?)Infobox

item.title: Praxis
item.description: Player: Rowan (they/them/he/him)Infobox

item.title: Hera
item.description:
Player: Alli (she/her)Infobox
Paragus Kou has once again hired HeraðŸ‘¿ to escort the Kou family to a village known as Tansho. Kou has given little information as to why. As they arrived in Tansho, Hera was warned by a benevolent monstrosity, a Shokari, that Tansho spelled danger. Sure enough, a Veyâ€™lflood had consumed the town and Paragus ordered her to go to Ninnan gate. One of the Shokari gave her a mount to travel with, allowing her to travel at a faster pace and meet with the party. After the events of Ninnan gate, Hera found herself captured with someone asking her questions which she did not cooperate with them. She then awoke to nearly being killed when Serai saved her. After meeting up with Paragus and his son, they found a samurai who just about killed Yari. Paragus, Barolt, and Serai stayed behind to buy time for Hera to escape the samurai. The last thing she told her was to meet Serai at their family home.

item.title: Ceol
item.description:
Player: Ceol (he/him?)Infobox
As the guardian walked out of the Taor ruin, the guardian's eyes stopped on CeolðŸ”¥ and seemed to break free for just a moment, begging them to leave. CeolðŸ”¥ then spoke to it in Dwarvish as he theorized it was a Dwarf based on its stature. It was able to have a few more moments of clarity, begging them to leave and saying he couldnâ€™t stop, all words spoken in Dwarvish. It continued to follow them, though now at a much slower pace.

item.title: Session 9
item.description:
Party headed towards Iron Blossom Keep... The land looks like a desert, which is wrong... It should be lush this time of year
Himoto was claimed to be busy
Ganra Dokugan, Tekina of Tsuchigomo, greets us, trusting that HeraðŸ‘¿ would be safe
WahlenðŸ’« feels the book give him a message...
HeraðŸ‘¿ talks with Ganra Dokugan...
She is given a magic crystal that shoots out a beam, normal people can use it, it doesn't feel limited... It's a part of a Taor ruin
Himoto, HeraðŸ‘¿'s father, is in charge of this enterprise. But he has not gotten his daughters involved It is "in the works" that this power could be used on a larger scale (mega death star vibes)
HeraðŸ‘¿ gets a crystal, giving her eldritch blast for free?!
HeraðŸ‘¿ and Ganra Dokugan enter the summit...
People are already arguing: Gunshi Kage (military strategist, old man), Arbiter Abidia Hashin, Second Gunshi Arubia (Ikcho) Not a peace treaty deal, too many military people... People are arguing, some promised people in battle but not delivering, more and more arguing As the screaming dies down, a woman speaks up
Dwarves of Ikcho drove back enemies in the first war
Ganra Dokugan warns us to LEAVE, there will be a battle
Kazera, "The Breath of Wind", states that Ganra Dokugan is going to hunt "The Snow Queen" now
A full battle breaks out, Ikcho getting pushed back...
As the party is leaving, 3 bearers ambush us... They wear armor of Yatari, they are trying to escort people out of battle
3 Bearers from the Hikari Seiji
2 large blades, Wyvern
Biyast, in charge
Light on feet, short blade, Avis
A giant hand comes out from the ground, Tsuchigomo
A small crystal forms in the sky as a blizzard comes, a catlike Yuki-onna bursting from the crystal
Cannons from Ikcho fire at the Yuki-onna, Tsuchigomo approaching... Two Akion fight, an event that has only happened once in history
We fall, running from the battle of Akions
HeraðŸ‘¿ and Ruiâ›„ fall behind, the Yuki-onna hovering above them... They dodge the ice shards before running through the footprints of Tsuchigomo
CeolðŸ”¥ and HeraðŸ‘¿ fall and become unconscious
Wyvern heals everyone
We fight the Tekina of Yuki-onna, trying to flee from battle...
Ruiâ›„ seems to have a connection to the Yuki-onna, wanting us to stop fighting but we don't
We kill the Tekina of the Yuki-onna, Ruiâ›„'s head getting grabbed beforehand and information being transferred... She screams, recoiling in pain
Mako is here, aka Wyvern... He defends us against the other two bearers Greenish orange dragon saves us from reinforcements...
A man on all fours walks out... Paragus Kou also joins us...
Throws a crystal like HeraðŸ‘¿ had and a portal opens up We arrive at a place that a lot of people have gathered, lot of bearers
Yari is here, half of his face gnashed; he takes Ruiâ›„'s pain away with his lineage's ability
We are between Ikcho, Yatari, and Samni, a small area below the border
Paragus Kou meets with the party...
WahlenðŸ’« tells him about the dream
CeolðŸ”¥ recounts that 2 icons of the same element is unheard of, he fought in a war with (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone
Ganra Dokugan is mentioned, maybe they are working with them, the Tekina of the Kagenami
[Hera]] asks about Paragus Kou...
Paragus Kou is a fugitive from Yatari, Samni, and Ikcho and the Kagenami
He wants to understand the Veylfloods and get peace to Bearers
He walked into a Veylflood and was unharmed... due to a Helix Dragon... he is the spring dragon...
Ruiâ›„'s turn...
His son became a Veyllost
Shioriâ­ of the shadowstriders "Don't trust... It eats gods"
Akenai does not officialy exist, but the ruler of what Yatari is now, Timbatzu Azuna the ruler, were affiliated... After investigating, Paragus Kou is no longer allowed in Yatari. They were doing something with the Taor ruins
2nd Akion of fire right outside of a Taor ruin
Iron works is making crystals made out of Taor ruins
Akion of fire fighting a red-aired man made of steel, land splits in half, Timbatzu Azuna WASN'T ALWAYS A Tekina, they sacrificed many Oni

item.title: Session 1
item.description:
The land of (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone was blessed in the land of the mother leaves; Temptation lures us into the leaves shadow.
Everyone arrives at a spring festival sponsored and hosted by the House Talvec in Saohun whose leader is High Lord Admiral Talvek:
We open with a vision from Shioriâ­: canine beast fights dragon that tunnels down a cavern where the beast stabs the dragon They talks to their company, they are companions.
Has a shiba inu familiar, Akaza!
HeraðŸ‘¿ walks into town, late 40s older man accompanying her along with a shirtless man in lags and a wolf head who has not spoken their entire journey. Hair in braided ponytail, heavy armor, pale, giant sword
WahlenðŸ’« is met by a blonde Tabaxi woman, ushering them inside a booth... "How do you not know what you are doing, you've been with the guild 2 years..."
CeolðŸ”¥ arrives on a work order, meets the gator wrestling woman who hired him. large shield, ruby beard, old man, comically oversized scroll and a broken sword on back
Ruiâ›„ arrives, getting hoxed into a contest of strength... They destroy the competition getting a reward.
Has a red panda familiar, Bam Bam!
WahlenðŸ’« steals Ruiâ›„'s reward because Ruiâ›„ is a sucker and then gets most of the party to drink experimental tea from Akenai. Tea of "minor harmless effects."
The hosting Samurai Talvec has an announcement, after having his 100 titles announced...
â€œThe time of Suteki is nigh. Let it be the harrowed moon red in the crimson carrowbird appearance. Let us all rejoice for we are not rulers.â€ then Talvek slits his throat which drains black blood and beings with fox masks crawl out Combat ensues, toughest enemy dies, we find [7 white ceramic shards] seemingly from a mask; creatures are a type of yokai (other worldly)
Talvekâ€™s grandson is taking up the samurai title; his father is no samurai The spring dragon did not pass over
Akenai is missing and alligator lady said they did not have a potion seller on the docket Grandson says he hasnâ€™t heard from their shrine maiden since last week who recently dealt with a yokai incursion and hires us to investigate

item.title: praxis
Session 11
item.description:
We arrive at Lostwing, a Taor ruin of a wing... The village is made around it... It should be bright like a candle, there is no light or people
THEY TOOK other bearers to the Shiro Akuagan
Looking for a Tekina that is no longer here
5 bearers imprisoned, one of which are Enokaga
We meet Kazera after the battle, where she summons something to fight us...
She offers us a job with Yatari, if we worked for them, we'd work for Timbatzu Azuna
Hikari Seiji attacked Yatari
Paragus Kou and Kazera know each other
She used to be a very faithful woman, that's why Paragus Kou married her He betrayed his country, a lord commander?
The emperor, Timbatzu Azuna whispered to people that he didn't think Levin was a god Poisoned battalions that he was in command of
They found the Tekina, they vanish We rest after the fight, going to the fort tomorrow...
Red cloak person was asking for the Tekina of Fire We approach the fort... Go in through a sewer
Yatari will be using the Tekina of fire...
We fight Kazera...
The flames that consumed Ryu are not holy by nature
HeraðŸ‘¿ is hiding something "There you are" Reading letter
"Lord Takuta, as my advisor retires if you are my next top candidate... You will be the youngest inducted, Wahlen Takuta, Sigillite of TeradaðŸ’«, pure silver hair toat goest to shoulders, Reading letter of friend?
Lord Sachio, tactical wit did bring doubt, but without it... it was highly unlikely that we would live. Warmaster Oharah Sachio
"I'm waiting WahlenðŸ’«"

item.title: Forgotten Lands Map
ulone_map
Session 10
item.description:
We are going north towards a town, Lostwing Traversing through an overgrown forest
WahlenðŸ’« gathers some plant poison that was spit at HeraðŸ‘¿
After the party kills human-sized red beetles, Ruiâ›„ grabs some of their shells We find a carriage 210 cp, 90 sp, 40 gp 3 common healing potions
We fight the Guardian... The group wounds it, the wounds are covered in pipes and tubes that magically reconnect (even with distance). It's only a matter of time before it comes back
WahlenðŸ’« feeds it blood, and it reanimates... oops See a man in whiteish black armor running past...
He's an honor guard from Yatari, we follow him
HeraðŸ‘¿ recognizes Kazera, the Tekina of the Wind
A man is pleading for his life, he brought someone to Lostwing... They are looking for a Tekina
The captain we fought is a blessed of Tengu
Where Mako is the blessed of Ryu

item.title: Shino Korin Hikari
item.description: Tekina of Komyoryu

item.title: Level Up
item.description: 3 => 4 Spell Sniper: +1 INT 4 => 5 5 => 6 +4 HP = 24 2x 3rd level spells Fear Counter Spell Fixed Fey Touched Misty Step and Sleep always prepared

item.title: Session 5
item.description:
HeraðŸ‘¿ sees a Veylflood in Tansho...
Bearers have the Veil in them, too much causes the flood
Staying in it too long would become Veil Lost
We arrive at Ninnan Gate .

item.title: Session 4
item.description:
Mako and Shioriâ­ have a moment in the training yard, talking and supporting one another
Scene with Ruiâ›„ and Akaza
Akaza really likes beetles & bugs and not talking about his responsibilities
Shioriâ­ is officially welcomed into the Shuki family... if there is a mirage... between her and Mako 10 day travel
We see a Krasu, similar to a goblin Kidnap it and interrogation
Javaku, bramble monster, not a Yokai

item.title: Session 3
item.description:
The Yari Talvec comes in to check in with CeolðŸ”¥... Did we really go to the Suteki and meet the Yokai King?
This act is strictly against the Samurai Code He does not have the authority to protect or punish us... What should our fates be?
We meet with Mako's and Akaza's father, where Mako gets his first mission with us accompanying him
We are to investigate the town called Kaminan to the north where there have ben potential Yokai sightings. We are to determine if this is true or not, and if it is true we are to kill them. 25 gp each payout, 50 gold in basic supplies
Meanwhile Mako's father and Samni's leader is moving to Ninnan Gate to deal with this potential threat We buy a horse, carriage, and supplies A scene to haggle for a lower price
WahlenðŸ’« buys 10 gp worth of spell supplies
Akaza and Mako play Yahtzee
Atidari, ruler of Samni and Mako's and Akaza's father
We meet Mako's and Akaza's mother, Atzaru, and she gives us information
Prophecy?: The reincarnation of Ryu will go into the ruins of Taor in Ninnan Gate and emerge to lead us into battle
Yatari is growing restless for war

item.title: Session 2
item.description:
The party has a morning greeting to one another in the barn they were staying in... Shioriâ­ is awoken my Mako. Mako is excited about their new job!
Shioriâ­ is worried about Akaza, saying he must prove himself before he can join us... "If you can control your powers you can come."
CeolðŸ”¥ has a tea ritual almost every morning, offers everyone some
CeolðŸ”¥ points out that Shioriâ­ is the sister to the heir to the throne... Akaza?
CeolðŸ”¥ was in the war of the Great Shattering, ~200-300 years ago
Ruiâ›„ is from Ikcho. Mako notes that a lot of radical Yatarians fight with a similar flowery dance style The party sets out to the shrine... A LOT of dead birds belly up on the road, as if fallen out of their air. No sickness. Necromancy magic
Guarded, something wrong inside, another Shrine Maiden went inside to protect Lleth Somethings feels off, we fight LOOT: 1x yellow and 1x green talisman Inside the shrine... Everything is destroyed and looks discredited. The shrine maiden is tied to a chair, hood over head, talismans on body
Dude with face of pug, looks like a bear, hooves, named Ghomah (?)
"Tell Oharah I said go fuck himself!" - he poofs away and we hear shuffling away
He smashes a yellow and green talisman together, a grey area forming before he jumps in, looks like the Suteki We smash the talismans the same way Silver hair going to hips, fox hair ears, Sephiroth with less aura Guy with red hair Same bear guy there
He assumes we are with Oharah. We ask who that is
Oharah is responsible for the festival and Lleth by letting the Suteki into her mind... They were trying to "help" Lleth
Kitsune - Terrada, current king of Yokai, Oharah is a rebellious youth who has gathered a lot of support... We are in the realm of Suteki
The talismans are "a being made manifest" that can extract the Suteki influence
Levin stops Terrada from coming to the mortal plane... Levin didn't appreciate what they did in the Great War
Why did Oharah attack the festival?
He opens a window showing a giant forest, where there are bunch of creatures fighting and regenerating... "Without consumption of people we go rabid...." Oharah blames him for this... Each Yokai needs to eat different parts of a human in order to live... Some blood, some flesh, etc.
Two icons have awakened in Yatari, Amanozako and Komyoryu, darkness and lightness Two entities clashed, one on a horse of darkness and a blade, the other is flying and is in the form of a dragon
WahlenðŸ’«'s book is like Zhokan's book
Mako and Shioriâ­
They've gone without the summer dragon for 19 years already.... The boy (Akaza) needs to become a man
Mako hasn't been allowed to go out on missions by his father... He wants to be ready badly
Tensions rise, Samni will prepare for a skirmish, Oharah would take root there

item.title: Note in Book
item.description: Your acquaintances, Legion Since youâ€™ve been so kind to us, weâ€™ll tell you what that blade was. Weâ€™ll even throw in a couple hints as a treat. That blade was stolen from Terrada, King of the Yokai. It is a shard of him. But we are happy you have it now. If you want to know more, help Wyvern in his quest. Also, when you see The Whirlwind calling to you, go into it. This will give you more than enough information for now.

item.title: Book
Session 7
item.description:
Serai saves HeraðŸ‘¿, dragging in her equipment
Serai and HeraðŸ‘¿ argue "You know father's madness, he could have just made that up?!"
HeraðŸ‘¿ is worried about her ring, putting it on quickly
A samurai from Saohun knows, old man with a dog thing, and a bearer.
Paragus Kou comes with his beast, checking on HeraðŸ‘¿
They see a samurai fighting a fledgling that we know from Ninnan Gate...
Paragus Kou and Serai join the fight, letting HeraðŸ‘¿ run
Serai and HeraðŸ‘¿ "How will I find you again?" "You know where home is." "I love you..."
Paragus Kou turns into an orange dragon
Serai wields her father's blade
HeraðŸ‘¿ runs away, seeing the party. She tracks us...The party meets at the inn, catching up
Only real lead we have to our allies that helped us in (4) A Guttering Light is that Serai told HeraðŸ‘¿ that they could meet at home... 2-3 weeks away
We go to find the guy's son, Motomai, from (5) Superstitions Put to Steel
Bam Bam gets a scent, sprinting into the darkness
A floating carriage with spectral horses races past us, going to where we are trying to find Motomai
We come to a Taor ruin...
We see many Abhuman's in a place that looks like Bloodshore Rock A man with crimson red silk steps from the carriage, with someone blindfolded and bound in tow
WahlenðŸ’« is standing next to Akenai and Terrada, a memory he does not remember....
Terrada is holding a small orb "We do not need to draw attention to ourselves"
"With you, me, and WahlenðŸ’«, we don't need to hide in the shadows anymore" "What advisor betrays his king?" Blade goes into the spine of the book then shuts
HeraðŸ‘¿'s feels strength going through
Ruiâ›„'s goes from head to toe swiftness and cold
CeolðŸ”¥'s hammer, searing fire that now feels painless knowledge
WahlenðŸ’«'s knowledgeable weapon
House Liotus, once ruled by samurai, took the inn out, a lot of dead Abhumans that were once at the inn.
Lady Ayame Liotus Maggot inn-keeper, covered in holes...
Name is Legion
"I am something Levin forgot..."
Veylfall, the Yokai became so used to what it was... Humanity built better defenses against Veylfall and resisted the Yokai

item.title: Session 6
item.description:
WahlenðŸ’« remembers the words from the person he saw that disappeared a Ninnan Gate... "We have found you" in words spoken by unknown man
Captured by Kamanani, group of samurai that captured Samni...
We are brought to Imugi Arcaneworks Each person has a conference with unknown people, where we are trapped and shackled... Things are going wrong, they don't want the information we have They give us more and more berries, where we remain unconscious They are going to kill us
Our allies from Saohun come to save us...
Paragus Kou, Yari, Serai,
We get out, our Yari from Saohun staying behind to cover for us We fight on railroad tracks, holding off wave after wave of enemy before we see an opening... A construct chases us, we kill it before flying off the rails, falling into running water
We were drugged since Ninnan Gate, lost time... We were out for 6 months
Paragus Kou was supposed to find us at Ninnan Gate and saw that we were hauled away

item.title: portrait_ceol
ref_hera
Session 8
item.description:
We are traveling with House Liotus... A blizzard is approaching... People start going missing over the course of days, we were once 40, now we're 30
Some people think it's just people leaving the army, some think it's the Yuki-onna
Ruiâ›„ talks to Naria, a scared soldier who doesn't know what to do with the people going missing... They explain what guns are too, a creation of Arcaneworks
Grief council Gyota, face painted, monkey, rosy cheeks, blue hair... WahlenðŸ’« goes in and gets traumatized... Ruiâ›„ goes in, the person has a different set of paint on their face...
A whole cart of 5 disappear, we see the bodies again in a cart... The bodies have the napes of the neck gone... We assume this is the work of a Yokai
WahlenðŸ’« found a note, he tells no one: Your Lord Bring me WahlenðŸ’« and CeolðŸ”¥
WahlenðŸ’« put a worm from Legion onto one of the dead Yokai
Tekina of Tsuchigomo, wants HeraðŸ‘¿'s house to meet at the border
HeraðŸ‘¿'s dad, Himoto, is already there
Enokaga goes back to Saohun
Ruiâ›„ goes through HeraðŸ‘¿'s old bedroom because she's nosy
We put a mattress from HeraðŸ‘¿'s home in a cart then left

item.description:
Find the general lore here.Active Members
CeolðŸ”¥
HeraðŸ‘¿
Ruiâ›„
Shioriâ­
WahlenðŸ’«
Ulone

Whistling Mountains
Land of Leaves
Unused Items

item.title: Yuan-Ti
item.description: The last of the common races and have a general attracting aura around them. They are quick to make friends, possibly because their scales resemble that of the Heili dragonâ€™s. But make no mistake, they were seen as one of, if not the greatest fighters in the war.

item.title: Triton
item.description: While hailing from the sea, they are not all necessarily sea ronin but do come with the innate power to command water and are the one race aside from Yuan-ti that are given the magical exemption. They are the youngest of the new races and itâ€™s not rare to see one as a bodyguard.

item.title: Tieflings
item.description: Levin created them.

item.title: Humans
item.description: The most common species in Ulone, therefore most samurai and higher individuals are human. Overall they have a very neutral standing with people as they never did anything world changing in the war.

item.title: Tabaxi
item.description: Also known as â€˜Noyonaâ€™, they are a race of felines, sometimes having only cat eyes and other times looking entirely like a cat. They are the oldest of the more uncommon races as it is said that Ulone created them. There are even some rumors that one was his wife.

item.title: Half Elves
item.description: The start of the less common races, half elves are spared persecution due to their ancestors switching sides in the Great War. But they are on a very thin line. Itâ€™s not uncommon for them to be refused service. Just penance for their ancestors' actions.

item.title: Halfling
item.description: One of the newer races, it is said that Levin took the holy parts of the Dwarves to create a new race fit. These are rather uncommon but often have kind souls and generally fit right in with Dwarves.

item.title: Dragonborn
item.description: Said to be an offshoot of the Yuan-Ti, Dragonborn are incredibly rare and are rumored to be fallen scales from the Heili dragons. No one has confirmed if this is true, but as of right now, itâ€™s treated as fact.

item.title: Dwarves
item.description: The second most common race. However unlike humans they are often revered due to simply being the same race as Ulone. They might even get a pass for not addressing a samurai as â€˜lordâ€™ or â€˜ladyâ€™.

item.title: Bearers
item.description: This name is given to the mutant races or ones that naturally have magic, excluding Yuan-ti and Triton, They are also known as the â€˜slave raceâ€™ or â€˜Markedâ€™ as they are property for the superior races. Ink is cast on their face to mark them, removal of this brand carries the possibility of death as poison can leak into veins. Buying a new bearer is commonplace, but the bearers who are able to fight cost quite a good amount. Attempting to remove their brand is punishable by death for the bearer and anyone involved.

item.title: Awakening Info
item.description:
The Whistling MountainsWÃ¤hlen awoke in the whistling mountains, only their book keeping them company. However, a large humanoid creature met with WÃ¤hlen, claiming to be an Oni and ordered WÃ¤hlen off of the mountain. This contradicts public information as Oni are supposed to be extinct. 
The Ikcho Crafters
In the book, there was a name given to an Ikcho crafter WÃ¤hlen was supposed to meet with by the name of Akenai Sachio.
